website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 is a decent little 10x zoom camera, but similar models from Nikon, Panasonic, and even Sony itself offer more for your money.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 has a very good ultrawide-angle lens with a 10x zoom in a small slim body
It's also relatively easy to use
cons: The W690's shooting performance is slow and photos get noticeably noisier and softer at ISO 400, so you'll need a lot of light to get good results

customer_reviews.title: Cyber shot is a good line - compact styles however are better for appropriate hands - compact.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a damaged 2012 model of the Cybershot series. Unbeknownst to me, it is a compact version of the original. The zoom button has been moved to the back of the camera, which makes a one-hand shot w/zoom more difficult. I actually looked for the 2012 model and fortunately was able to find some in stock yet. The larger version of the cyber-shot had a larger lens & was better-proportioned all around, with the zoom more conveniently located on the top of the camera. Cyber shot line is quite good for the price, but the larger model is easier to maneuver. The compact series are just too small for larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: JT on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a Cyber-Shot DSC-570 which I really liked (cropped and had to tape up battery, SM card compartment). Purchased this DSC-W690 as a replacement. Wonderful little camera with same features plus more zoom and a little larger LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Janet F.

customer_reviews.title: Soy Cyper-shot Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people who are technologically challenged. I don't want a camera with so many "bells and whistles" that I could never figure out how to use it. This is the perfect camera for someone like me. It's so easy to use, compact and easy to carry, yet does have several "bells and whistles" for those who want to use them. If you want simple, you have it in this camera. If you want more sophisticated features, you also have them in this camera. However, the more sophisticated features do not prevent you from simple "point and shoot" photography.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This camera will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I had had one of these cyber-shot for years and then I accidentally damaged it (not the camera's fault). I wanted to be able to use the card and battery so I bought another one but this one is even better. I have a 8 Gig card and it holds 1100 pictures I think that is medium resolution. This camera has lots of options but it is simple to operate, you don't have to read a 80 page manual to take pictures. it has good battery life but I do recommend a 2nd battery.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Latch Issues
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived as I would have expected it, was used but was like new. My problem is with the camera itself, the clip that keeps the battery in broke so whenever I open the battery/memory card slot it just pops out. The Latch that keeps the battery/memory card slot cover shut is a bit fragile and has become very weak. Now just putting the camera in my pocket can move the clip and open the slot cover. I works as I expect it but I'm disappointed in the build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Branch

customer_reviews.title: I like most of the features
customer_reviews.text: I selected this camera on the recommendation of my brother, who is something of an amateur photographer (I told him I wanted something simple,:point and shoot). I like most of the features, however, I dislike the zoom sound when filming video. I did purchase an extra battery to keep charged and carry in my purse at all times.
customer_reviews.author: akamel

customer_reviews.title: it works just like it was brand new
customer_reviews.text: Even though this was purchased as a used camera, it works just like it was brand new. Had one of these before that got stolen from me, so I picked this up as a replacement. I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Regner

customer_reviews.title: Not a great camera at all
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera due to it being very small and lightweight. It is horrible at taking pictures. the auto camera mode setting when using the flash is like putting a huge flood light up in front of what you're a taking a picture of.Everything is white so I am not impressed at all and it doesn't get any better or easier to setup with all the settings it has... not much of a point and shoot camera if you ask me I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: This one replaced an older model I dropped.
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a 50X optical zoom by Cannon for our vacation photos outside which is big and bulky but needed a pocket camera when we don't want to carry or need something with such a high optical zoom. Having purchased Sony products in the past, this upgrade is proving to be a great camera for the price. So far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: DaWizSista

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I had another sony cyber shot but I was taking a picture of one of my horses and another one came up behind me and broke it. so I picked this one., it is awesome. it has the instruction built in the camera. that is a very good thing for you do not have to carry a instruction book with you. still trying to figure out how to work the instructions though. that would be the only downfall to this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Groom

customer_reviews.title: I like it but It's difficult to do some closeup photos
customer_reviews.text: I like it but It's difficult to do some closeup photos. I think that is just me...lol It takes very good pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Proprietary USB connection make this camera a bit of pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Proprietary USB connection make this camera a bit of pain. I wish they went with a standard USB min connection.
customer_reviews.author: James S. LesekeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera to replace our very old Cyber-Shot that recently stopped functioning. This new and improved version is slim and easy to transport. It fits in a small purse even with the case. It is convenient and easy to use. So far, the picture quality is fine.

customer_reviews.title: What could be better?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my mostly technology illiterate wife and it has been worth every penny. Fits in her pocket, goes everywhere, takes great pictures with very little user input and she can do her own downloads. I couldn't have asked for more.

customer_reviews.title: Second Cybershot to die in too short a time
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Cybershots in the first place for their great zoom and compact body, but this is the second one I've had in 4 years stop working entirely. This one lasted just more than a year. I do not drop them or treat them harshly - I take very good care of my possessions. The first one the light sensor went out, this time the ability to focus has died. I have to be done with Sony, it upsets me too much to have to replace my camera every year. That's a ridiculously short-lived piece of technology.
customer_reviews.author: Smilee306

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but takes a while to load and take ...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera but takes a while to load and take pics so it kinda makes it annoying. I bought it bcuz my previous sony camera stopped working and I had such a good run with it. Its not bad but I suspect there are better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Camera For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Parents to replace an aging camera. Bought it at a great price and was really happy with the output of both the pictures and video on this camera. Not as good as my higher priced Sony, but very nice all the same. I am use to the Sony menus on my camera and this one was not much different, except that it has less options, therefor a simpler menu. I set it in Intelligent mode and showed them how to zoom, how to switch back and forth from video mode, press the shutter button, and how to view the files and they were good to go...
customer_reviews.author: B. Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the focus

Creates a yellowish image at night on white. Color is an issue. If you have the money, and do not mind a regular DSLR, go for that. Get a Canon or Nikon. This is only good for daylight pics and when you need a small camera that will fit in your back pocket. No more. EXPENSIVE.

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my cruise photos :(
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more unhappy with this purchase. I bought this camera to take on a once in a lifetime cruise. The small size and simple point/shoot operation were quite attractive to me. The camera worked fine for the first day of my trip. By Day 2, it developed a black spot that showed up in any photos that were zoomed in to any degree. A number of my photos are ruined as a result. I am a diehard Amazon shopper and generally very happy with everything that I buy, but this was a most disappointing purchase.

customer_reviews.author: kbarkley

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 MP Digital Camera - Lemon?
customer_reviews.text: Hated this camera. Although, I have to give credit to Amazon & Circuit City (where it was purchased) for promptly and without any drama, reimbursing my account. I have owned 5 Cybershots prior to this one and had been trying to buy this particular one for several weeks after I had dropped my previous one, but was unavailable (pre-order). In the end, I was excited to finally get it. I like the size of Cybershots and the simplicity, but in this case, the photos were horrible. Not to say that I might've gotten a lemon, but I wasn't going to take another chance.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: good picts
customer_reviews.text: very good picts and the camera is very easy to use. Has lots of settings if you prefer to set them yourself but the easy picture setting seems to work the best as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joedirt

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 Digital Camera is a super-compact point-and-shoot with more under the hood than meets the eye. This sleek little number is host to a 16.1Mp image sensor, a 3.0" LCD screen, Optical SteadyShot image stabilization, 10x optical zoom, and more! And in addition to capturing stills, the W690 also records 720p HD video. A bevy of auto functions also come in handy by taking the guesswork out of image making. Functions like iSCN, Natural Flash, Picture Effect, and more do all the hard work while you enjoy the memory in-progress.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-W690 16.1 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 10X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.0-INCH LCD 

 * 10x optical zoom
   
 * Capture your videos in 720p HD Movie mode
 * Take stunning images in Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360°
 * 16.1 MP plus a 3.0-inch LCD
   
 * Optical SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur
   
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
 * iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
 * Face Detection and Smile Shutter technologies
   
 * Anti-Blink, Face Priority and Red Eye Reduction functions
 * Soft Skin mode reduces visible blemishes and wrinkles




































Shoot beautiful photos and HD 720p video with the slim Sony 16.1MP DSC-W690. Get close to your subject with the stabilized 10X optical zoom lens, use its colorful 3.0-inch LCD to compose and share images, and select the iSCN mode to automatically set the best exposure for tricky scenes.



KEY FEATURES
10X OPTICAL ZOOM
The Sony 10x optical zoom G lens brings distant subjects super close for great outdoors, sports, and travel photos. The compact size makes it easy to take with you in a pocket, purse, or backpack.


720P MP4 HD MOVIE MODE

In 720p MP4 movie mode, the DSC-W690 shoots 1280 x 720 high definition movies at 30 fps, a standard format when working with a PC.1 Users will create high quality movies with full use of optical zoom in files small enough to transfer to compatible PC or Mac computer. Once transferred to your computer and connected to the internet, you can effortlessly upload your media to popular photo and video-sharing websites such as Photobucket and YouTube.

SWEEP PANORAMA MODE-UP TO 360°
Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the DSC-W690 can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep.


16.1 MEGAPIXEL IMAGE SENSOR

A powerful 16.1 megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 16.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19 inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots.

3.0-INCH CLEAR PHOTO LCD DISPLAY
Generous 3.0-inch (230K dots) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight.



OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION

Optical SteadyShot image stabilization uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality.


INTELLIGENT AUTO MODE
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting in clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Kids on the playground, landscape shots, a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party; all result in clear images without leaving auto mode.

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS 

Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects. 

PHOTO CREATIVITY
Photo Creativity allows you to fine-tune your exposure settings, such as brightness, color, and vividness, and quickly choose the right enhancement for your subject. Now you can view Picture Effects and Photo Creativity effects in real time on the camera’s monitor or in the viewfinder before shooting.

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY 

Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.


SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY 


Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority andindicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 



ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION 

It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFT SKIN MODE

Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 33 different types of scenes and selects the appropriate camera settings. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH

Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.


DYNAMIC RANGE OPTIMIZER

Dynamic Range Optimizer (DRO) Standard and Plus uses a sophisticated algorithm to help recover shadows and highlights. The result is more natural images with clearer details that more closely match what your naked eye sees. DRO is particularly effective when shooting backlit portraits or any scene with a dramatic contrast between background and foreground lighting. DRO Plus allows for even greater optimization by analyzing each region of an image and performing additional image processing.

SELF-PORTRAIT TIMER
Self-Portrait Timer helps take the guesswork out of self-portraits by utilizing Face Detection technology to recognize when your face enters the frame. Once the camera detects your face, it triggers a 2-second timer, and then snaps a picture. 


 * 
 * 

1. Records in 29 minute segments
feature_bullets: 16.1 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
